content: वंच् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (वंचति) {@--1@} To go, to arrive at; ववंचुश्चाहवक्षितिं <ls>Bk. 14. 74</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">7. 106.</ls> {@--2@} To wander over. {@--3@} To go slyly or secretly, sneak. {@--4@} To go crookedly. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To shake, totter, tremble. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (वंचयति-ते) {@--1@} To avoid, escape from, evade, shun; अहिं वंचयति; अवंचयत मायाश्च स्वमायाभिर्नरद्विषां <ls>Bk. 8. 43.</ls> {@--2@} To cheat, deceive, defraud (said to be A. only, but often <ab>P.</ab> also); मूर्खास्त्वामववंचंत <ls>Bk. 15. 15</ls>; कथमथ वंचयसे जनमनुगतमसमशरज्वरदूनं <ls>Gīt. 8</ls>; (बंधनं) वंचयन् प्रणयिनरिवाप सः <ls>R. 19. 17</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 10</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 49</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 53.</ls> {@--3@} To deprive of, leave (one) destitute of; <ls>R. 7. 8.</ls>
